abstract: Lawyers offer closing remarks in corruption trial of New York Police Detective Jason Arbeeny, who is accused of planting drugs on innocent couple Yvelisse DeLeon and Juan Figueroa in order to meet his quota.
snippet: Closing remarks in the trial of Jason Arbeeny, a New York police detective accused of planting drugs on a woman and her boyfriend.
lead_paragraph: Closing remarks in the trial of Jason Arbeeny, a New York police detective accused of planting drugs on a woman and her boyfriend.

headline.main: In Drug-Planting Trial, Defense Says Officer Is Not Corrupt, but a Reformer
headline.print_headline: In Drug-Planting Trial, Defense Says Officer Is Not Corrupt, but a Reformer
headline.seo: Closing Arguments in Brooklyn Narcotics Corruption Case
